statements: SELECT * FROM GenomicData WHERE gene_name = 'ABC';
SELECT id, chromosome, position FROM GenomicData WHERE mutation_type = 'Insertion';
SELECT gene_name, dna_sequence FROM GenomicData WHERE id = 100;
SELECT * FROM GenomicData WHERE chromosome = 'X' AND position > 1000;
SELECT id, mutation_type, gene_name, chromosome FROM GenomicData WHERE position < 5000;
SELECT * FROM GenomicData WHERE chromosome = 'X' ORDER BY position DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, gene_name, mutation_type FROM GenomicData WHERE position BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000
SELECT chromosome, gene_name, dna_sequence FROM GenomicData WHERE mutation_type LIKE 'missense%'
SELECT * FROM GenomicData WHERE chromosome = 'Y' AND mutation_type = 'frameshift' ORDER BY gene_name ASC
SELECT id, mutation_type, dna_sequence FROM GenomicData WHERE position < 500 OR position > 10000 ORDER BY position
SELECT * FROM genes;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome, start_position FROM genes WHERE chromosome = 'X';
SELECT gene_name, variant_name, variant_type FROM genes INNER JOIN variants ON genes.gene_id = variants.gene_id;
SELECT gene_name, start_position, end_position FROM genes ORDER BY start_position DESC;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome, start_position, end_position FROM genes WHERE chromosome = 'Y' ORDER BY gene_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM genes;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome, start_position FROM genes WHERE chromosome='X' ORDER BY start_position DESC;
SELECT gene_name, variant_name, variant_type FROM genes JOIN variants ON genes.gene_id = variants.gene_id WHERE variant_type='SNP' ORDER BY variant_name ASC;
SELECT gene_name, start_position, end_position FROM genes WHERE start_position BETWEEN 1000 AND 2000;
SELECT gene_name, variant_name, frequency FROM genes JOIN variants ON genes.gene_id = variants.gene_id WHERE frequency > 0.2 ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM Genes;
SELECT gene_name, chromosome FROM Genes WHERE gene_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Variants ORDER BY variant_position DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Samples WHERE sample_type = 'blood';
SELECT sample_name FROM Samples WHERE variant_id = 1 AND sample_type = 'tissue';
SELECT * FROM Genes WHERE chromosome = 'X';
SELECT gene_name, gene_start, gene_end FROM Genes WHERE gene_start > 1000 ORDER BY gene_start DESC;
SELECT variant_name, variant_type, variant_position FROM Variants WHERE variant_type = 'SNP';

SELECT variant_name, gene_name, sample_name FROM Variants INNER JOIN Genes ON Variants.gene_id = Genes.gene_id INNER JOIN Samples ON Variants.variant_id = Samples.variant_id WHERE gene_name = 'BRCA1';
SELECT sample_name, sample_data FROM Samples WHERE sample_type = 'Control' ORDER BY sample_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM genetic_sequences;
SELECT sequence_name, gene_name FROM genetic_sequences;
SELECT dna_sequence FROM genetic_sequences WHERE sequence_id = 1;
SELECT study_name, lead_researcher FROM research_studies ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT variant_type, effect, impact_score FROM gene_variants WHERE impact_score > 50;
SELECT * FROM genetic_sequences ORDER BY sequence_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT gene_name, COUNT(*) FROM genetic_sequences GROUP BY gene_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT p.patient_id, p.genotype, g.sequence_name, v.variant_type FROM patient_genotypes p JOIN genetic_sequences g ON p.sequence_id = g.sequence_id JOIN gene_variants v ON p.variant_id = v.variant_id WHERE v.effect = 'Harmful' ORDER BY p.patient_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(impact_score) AS max_impact_score, MIN(impact_score) AS min_impact_score FROM gene_variants;
SELECT r.study_name, r.start_date, r.end_date, COUNT(p.patient_id) AS total_patients FROM research_studies r LEFT JOIN patient_genotypes p ON r.study_id = p.sequence_id GROUP BY r.study_name;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT name, age FROM Patient WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT variant_id, type, frequency FROM Variant ORDER BY frequency DESC;
SELECT name, sequence FROM Gene WHERE name LIKE 'BRCA%';
SELECT p.name, s.type, v.frequency FROM Patient p JOIN Sample s ON p.patient_id = s.patient_id JOIN Variant v ON s.sample_id = v.variant_id;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM Patient ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sample WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY sample_id ASC;
SELECT Variant.type, Variant.frequency, Gene.name FROM Variant JOIN Gene ON Variant.gene_id = Gene.gene_id;
SELECT Analysis.analysis_id, Sample.type, Variant.type FROM Analysis JOIN Sample ON Analysis.sample_id = Sample.sample_id JOIN Variant ON Analysis.variant_id = Variant.variant_id;
